recipeInstructions.text: Defrost the puff pastry and slice it into thin strips.
Snap the woody ends off each asparagus spear.
Spiral-wrap a strip of puff pastry around each asparagus spear.
Slice bacon strips lengthwise and wrap over the puff pastry.
Line a baking tray with parchment paper and place wrapped asparagus on it.
Brush with egg wash and sprinkle with black pepper.
Bake at 375°F (190°C) for 20 minutes until golden brown.
Mix spicy mustard and chili sauce for dipping sauce.
Serve hot with the dipping sauce.
